Posts.EditableText:
Just to let you know that I've renamed the "Creating Games" forum to "Quest 4 Forum". This forum is for anyone creating games with Quest 4.x (and also includes older posts about previous versions).

Quest 5 is, essentially, an entirely different product so questions about it should go in the separate Quest 5 Forum.
